author: cnbc.com
title: Dillard’s, Inc. to Report Fourth Quarter and Fiscal Year Results
text:
LITTLE ROCK, Ark.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Dillard’s, Inc. (NYSE: DDS) will announce results for the 14 and 53 weeks ended February 3, 2018 tomorrow, February 27, 2018, before the opening of the New York Stock Exchange.
View source version on businesswire.com : http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180226006527/en/
Dillard’s, Inc.
Julie J. Bull, 501-376-5965
Director of Investor Relations
Source: Dillard’s, Inc.
